question:
Which of the following statements is/are correct about the Nowruz?
  1. It is the name of the Iranian New Year
  2. It marks the beginning of the spring in the Northern Hemisphere
  3. It has been recognised as an Intangible Cultural Heritage by UNESCO
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: Nowruz is the name of the Iranian New Year. It has been celebrated by all the major cultures of ancient Mesopotamia. It marks the beginning of the spring in the Northern Hemisphere. Today the festival of Nowruz is celebrated in Iran, Iraq, India, Afghanistan, Tajikistan, Uzbekistan, Azerbaijan, Kazakhstan, and Kyrgyzstan. The third statement is also correct. In 2009, Nowruz was inscribed on the UNESCO Representative List of Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity as a festivity of rich diversity promoting peace and solidarity across regions and generations.
